definition: chaste tree or berry (Vitex agnus-castus)/alternative name for the Zhou Dynasty state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]
lit. a path covered in brambles/a course of action beset by difficulties (idiom)

sentences.english: It was in a corner that he lay, among weeds and nettles .
sentences.chinese: 它现在是躺在一个生满了荆棘和荒草的墙角边。

sentences.english: I stared at the bushes for a moment without seeing anything.
sentences.chinese: 我往那丛荆棘里盯了老半天，却什么也没看见。

sentences.english: The hedge seemed to disappear before him.
sentences.chinese: 荆棘看上去在他面前消失了。

sentences.english: The attorney's horn lies horizontally in the thorns .
sentences.chinese: 代琇律师的号角水平地躺在荆棘中。

sentences.english: And softer sings the linnet from the thorn;
sentences.chinese: 荆棘丛的红雀吟唱声更加无愁。

sentences.english: As a thorn goeth up into the hand of a drunkard, so is a parable in the mouth of fools.
sentences.chinese: 箴言在愚昧人的口中，好像荆棘刺入醉汉的手。

sentences.english: But worse than that - from head to foot, she was covered in thorns.
sentences.chinese: 但更糟的是，她从头部到脚都是荆棘。

sentences.english: Makers of traditional software will find the going even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 传统软件制造商之路将更加荆棘密布。

sentences.english: We can lose ourselves in all sorts of thorny byways .
sentences.chinese: 我们可能会在各种各样的荆棘岔道上迷失自己。

sentences.english: However, the bridge is not perfectly straight and optimistic, broken stones and thistles and thorns are paved .
sentences.chinese: 但，桥本身并非通直豁达，也有碎石和荆棘铺成的。

sentences.english: There was an old Stupa which was damaged with brambles and grass.
sentences.chinese: 于彼园中有古朽塔摧坏崩倒荆棘掩庭蔓草封户。

sentences.english: And the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a flame of fire out of the midst of a bush" (Ex.3:1-2)
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的使者从荆棘里火焰中向摩西显现。

sentences.english: Other seed fell among thorns, which grew up with it and choked the plants.
sentences.chinese: 有落在荆棘里的，荆棘一同生长，把他挤住了。

sentences.english: Other seed fell among thorns, which grew up with it and choked the plants.
sentences.chinese: 有落在荆棘里的，荆棘一同生长，把他挤住了。

sentences.english: Then said all the trees unto the bramble, Come thou, and reign over us.
sentences.chinese: 众树对荆棘说，请你来作我们的王。

sentences.english: I am in the morning hush, of Stronglehorn' jungle, green and lush.
sentences.chinese: 我是清幽安静的晨，弥漫在绿色幽盛的荆棘谷。

definition: lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
lit. a path covered in brambles/a course of action beset by difficulties (idiom)
potholed and bumpy road (idiom); fig. full of disappointment and dashed hopes
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects
road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
